and the data is prepared by a degree of diﬀerencing in order to make it stationary, i.e. to
remove trend and seasonal structures that negatively aﬀect the regression model. A value of
0 can be used for a parameter, which indicates to not use that element of the model. This
way, the ARIMA model can be conﬁgured to perform the function of an ARMA model, and
even a simple AR, I, or MA model. Adopting an ARIMA model for a time series assumes that
